excerpt.rendered: Paddle Colorado’s best whitewater, and soar among the treetops in one full day of adventure. Combine a family-friendly float or a high-adrenaline class IV whitewater experience with a zipline adventure. AVA offers whitewater rafting and zipline packages at both our Idaho Springs and Buena Vista outposts, with options for everyone, no matter where your Colorado trip takes you.
